title: Bloomberg Markets: Magoon Says Online Place to Be for Retail
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Magoon Says Online Place to Be for Retail
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Christian W Magoon CEO Amplify Investments Discussing ecommerce vs. bricks and mortar and investing in the retail exchange traded fund IBUY.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
